channel.title: development on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in development on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-04
item.description: Coinbase Multi-Factor Authentication Hack Affects at Least 6,000 Customers (1 minute read) Between March and May this year, hackers used a flaw in Coinbase’s account recovery process to bypass SMS multi-factor authentication and transfer funds out of at least 6,000 customers’ accounts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-12
item.description: Here’s everything Samsung announced at its August Unpacked event (3 minute read) Samsung announced four new devices at its August 11 Unpacked event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-13
item.description: Visa and Plaid call off $5.3 billion merger after Justice Department objection (3 minute read) Visa and Plaid have terminated plans to merge following antitrust pushback from the Department of Justice.
